awd_abstract_narration: 9422259  Mitra  The   Superconductivity Information Center (SIC)  was  established  at  Iowa  State  University  in 1987.  The Center responds  to  individual  inquiries  in the field of superconductivity, sends news flashes,  and  publishes   a   bi-monthly  newsletter,  High-Tc  Update,   which   is  distributed internationally, without charge, as hard copy,  electronic  mail,  and  downloadable  files.  The Center  has  approximately  2500  subscribers  of  which  2000 are in the USA.  The  Center  serves  the  scientific community by providing rapid, timely, and informal research  results concerning superconductivity.  %%%  The Superconductivity Information Center (SIC) was established at Iowa  State University in 1987.  The Center responds to individual inquiries  in the field of superconductivity, sends news flashes, and publishes a  bi-monthly   newsletter,   High-Tc  Update,   which   is   distributed  internationally,  without charge, as hard copy, electronic  mail,  and  downloadable files.  The Center has approximately 2500 subscribers, of  which 2000 are in the USA.  The Center serves the scientific community  by  providing rapid, timely, and informal research results  concerning  superconductivity.  ***
